pr_title: [KOGITO-3642] - SW Example with Events, REST Functions and RuleUnits

timeline.bodyText:
On a local test I got the following error:
AppointmentResourceTest.verifySchedulePatientAppointment:75  Expected: a value equal to or greater than <Tue Nov 17 10:50:11 AEST 2020> but: <Tue Nov 17 01:50:00 AEST 2020> was less than <Tue Nov 17 10:50:11 AEST 2020>
I would suggest to use java.time API, ex LocalDateTime instead of plain Dates as it makes this calculations a lot more consistent.
timeline.author: cristianonicolai

replies.bodyText: LOL, why did I use Calendar? Brain farts...
replies.author: ricardozanini

timeline.bodyText: This is just an extreme nitpick, but I'd leave out any reference to the gender here: it doesn't seem relevant for the example and it's a slippery topic.
